features: 【Small In Size, Big On Function】 Combined with Fan + Flashlight + Backup Power Bank function, JISULIFE F8 pocket bear fan would be an everyday-carry-essential fan to cool you off in hot day and is multifunctional to satisfy your diverse needs.

【14-21 Hours Cooling Time】Up to 21 hours cooling time in one full charge. Super long battery life allows you to enjoy it while travelling, commuting, working and any other outdoor activities. This mini handheld fan is USB rechargeable through regular usb socket, laptop, power bank or car charger.

【A Palm-sized Backup Charger】Featured with unique and pocket size design, F8 portable fan is easy to jam into a bag to tote around. And it is a perfect option as an external backup power bank to get your phone charged if necessary. It would be your ideal stocking stuffers gifts for women, adults.
【Also A Flashlight】Designed with a flashlight function as a bonus. You may not look for a flashlight firstly but you will find that this is quite helpful when go out for a walk at night.

【3-Stage Transformable Fan】Able to be completely folded to hide the blades, makes it small and compact enough to slip into nearly any pockets. It's a handheld fan when 180°folded and a desktop fan when 270°folded.

【Design Patent Protected】JISULIFE F8 3-IN-1 Handheld Fan is protected by US Design Patent. (Patent Number US D886,982 S.) Please be aware to identify and choose the JISULIFE patent protected products.

【Your Travel Essentials & Perfect Gifts】3 IN 1 Mini fan would be a perfect partner for travel/concert/makeup/eyelash/commute/wedding/camping/home/office/school. It is also an ideal gifts for women/mom/girls/kids/parents/grandma/men/dad/boys/friends/christmas/stocking stuffers for adults/white elephant gifts for women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a powerful and cute little fan that lasts a long time from a single charge + keeps me cool
reviews.reviewText: fan: 10/10 cooling capabilities. i got this fan to use when i'm chillin on my loft bed because it gets HOT in my room when the heat's on. there are times when i'm a little too chilly with this on, so i have to turn it down to the first speed. it's a more powerful fan than expected, which i love. it may be loud for some but i feel like it easily turns into background noise and isn't any louder than a regular fan with the same power.charge: i charged the fan for about an hour with my fast charging usb-c extension cable. it stayed on for just under 11 hours on speed 2. this is pretty good because a full charge is listed as taking 2-3 hours, which would give you 14 hours of speed 2 usage. i've fallen asleep for 8+ hours on speeds 1 and 2 just to wake up to the fan still being on, and it stays on for hours after that. on speed 1, it's on basically all day, though i only timed the 11 hour use (i remembered to test it then). note: i have only charged this with a usb-c cable + a block, not in a car or via laptop.flashlight: brighter than expected, works well. my only qualm is that i can't use the flashlight at the same time as the fan, but i don't mind. i mostly got this for the fan feature anyway, and the good reviews. i can't imagine really needing the fan and flashlight on at the same time.power bank: i don't really plan on using this for the power bank feature much, but it works!design: compact, cute, sturdy, and adjustable.other: i really like that this charges with usb-c because i have so many usb-c cables. that personally makes this product even better for me, because if something happens to the provided cable, i'll still have more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful and cute!
reviews.reviewText: Just got this handy little gadget today! First off, it’s literally supposed to look like a bear and I thought that was adorable. Secondly, this cute little device is a triple threat!! Works as a phone battery charger, a fan and a flashlight….I absolutely love it! Don’t let the looks fool you, the fan on this baby is powerful and so is the flashing. It comes with a charging cable which is great to have. The device itself is compact and has a little weight to it. The quality of the product is good as well. I’m currently charging the battery so I’m looking forward to seeing how long it will last. Overall, I am so glad I got this product! Also, the packing and shipping was fast and efficient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and easy to bring along
reviews.reviewText: I overheat at events sometimes when I’m excited, so I pack this along for a quick breeze straight to the face to cool down and it’s amazing. Love USB charging and no batteries too. The body of it isn’t flimsy, it’s very sturdy. And my kids have gotten ahold of it several times and messed around with it and it hasn’t broken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for those that overheat easily...
reviews.reviewText: I am a student athlete so I was looking for a way to cool down quick. I run hot anyways so I always felt miserable because I sweat pretty easily. I was SO excited when I purchased this. My mom has a similar one that she uses at work and she never leaves without it so I was happy to try it.PROS:The fan is very effective. There are two speeds but speed 1 alone was enough to generate enough of a breeze to cool me down. I used it while drinking a glass of ice water and the cool waft of air over the ice was MAGICAL. Speed number 2 was great when I needed to cool quick such as around my neck and down my shirt.I also think it is extremely safe especially since I am always around other students. The blades are made of blunt plastic and the fan stops when it comes in contact with , say, your fingers.I know some people were ambivalent about the sound. Personally, I do not mind it. The hum was very calming for me, especially when I have some downtime and I am trying to wind down from the chaos. The combination of the breeze and the hum was enough to lull me into a power nap.The charge lasts a LOOONG time. I charged it to full for about 2.5 hours. I use it between 1 and 2 speeds between 3-8 hours and it doesn't lose strength at all. It's been almost 3 weeks and I have yet to charge it.The flashlight is strong and bright. I do not have much use for it but I guess it is a nice feature for emergency.CONS:I wish it was smaller. I saw my mom's and hoped it would be smaller. Don't get me wrong...it is still pretty compact but it takes a little dexterity to manage. They described it as palm-sized. It is not so keep that in mind.Speaking of dexterity, it is sort of difficult to open it. If you do not fingernails or something sharp to "scratch" it out of its nook, you may have a hard time for a bit before you can get the fan out. It may be because it is still new and may loosen up but it is unlikely. I will post again if it changes.It comes with a small lanyard but it was hard to fit it into the little holes provided. I still have not been able to fit it in but will keep trying.The charging light was a little confusing, especially if you are used to the "red light, green light" (see what I did there? Those who know, know). It is a red light that blinks continuously until it it is fully charged. Then it becomes a solid red light when full.OVERALL:it is a good buy! Get it if you tend to overheat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and does the job
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to buy a handheld fan for a convention I went to this summer. Bought this one because it was cute and cheap. But boy was it a lifesaver! Cosplaying in the middle of August and walking around a room with like a thousand people… yeah I didn’t really sweat at all because I had this thing. And I got compliments on it to. Now I use it a lot at work for my desk (pictured), or I’ll even have it in hand while I’m presenting something at work (because I get nervous and sweaty, what can I say). The only thing I probably dislike about it is the fact that the blades are exposed. But that’s part of the design and I knew that before buying it, so I’m not gonna ding my review over that. It’s just sometimes if I’m not paying attention, I’ll talk with my hands and end up hitting my cheek with the spinning blades. Which doesn’t cause any serious injury because the blades aren’t sharp and they auto turn off if touched. But it’s just like a quick “ouch wtf!” when I’m not expecting it lol. Again, that’s my own fault and not a negative of the product. Just something you may wanna keep in mind if you’re like me and talk with your hands. Also this thing charges pretty quickly and lasts forever. Haven’t had a need to really use the flashlight feature, but it does work and it’s nice to know I have it if needed.
Cumple muy bien como un mini ventilador de bolsillo y lámpara, lamentablemente no sirve para cargar la pila de tu celular tengan eso en cuenta antes de comprar

This thing is so cute! Was very impressed with its portable charging function as well as I've never had good experiences with portable chargers in the past. It’s especially perfect for camping or any kind of road trips! Strong flashlight and the fan works really well for its size! Would definitely buy again!
Me sorprendió el tamaño, creí que era más pequeño. Sin embargo, tiene buen tamaño para la bolsa, funciona perfectamente todas sus funciones. Llego en buenas condiciones y en el tiempo estimado
Es muy fácil de transportar, bonito y refresca de verdad. Pero el envío es muy tardado
Utilissimo! La funzione ventilatore è ottima ! Occupa pochissimo spazio in borsa ed esteticamente è molto carino. Indispensabile in viaggio .
